resources.string:
I am a software developer and a student at the University of UNEXPO, Venezuela. 
 I am passionate about learning new technologies and solving problems. 
 I am currently looking for a software engineering position. 
 I am a self-taught programmer and I am always learning new things. 
 I am a team player and I am always ready to learn new things. 
 I am a problem solver and I am always looking for new ways to solve problems. 
 I love write stories and I am always trying to improve my writing skills.
A shining star in the night
